actions.desc: The pixiu makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.desc: The pixiu has an appetite for gold, silver, and jewels and consumes them whenever possible. If the pixiu attempts to eat a magical coin, gemstone, or piece of jewelry, the object has a 25% chance of breaking, dispelling its magic and rendering it useless. If the object doesn’t break, the pixiu gives up trying to eat it.
special_abilities.name: Consume Treasure

special_abilities.desc: The pixiu is immune to disease and to effects that would lower its maximum hp. In addition, each ally within 10 feet of the pixiu has advantage on saving throws against disease and is immune to effects that would lower its maximum hp.
special_abilities.name: Protector of Qi

special_abilities.desc: A pixiu can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.
special_abilities.name: Treasure Sense
